Risk-assured, you will get a brand-new one if the android tablet is crushed when it drops from the tab. At the same time, all the features are accessible with precise cut-outs of ports, cameras. A colorful and Stable stand on the back of the case allows toddlers to go hands-free for watching videos and video chatting.

【5 Years Quality Assurance】Customer satisfaction is always our first standard. If there is any problem with the use of kids learning tablet, please feel free to contact us, we will always here help you out within 24 hours . 180-days money-back and 5 years of life time worry-free protection .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely slow and barely works
reviews.reviewText: Update! After my below review the company contacted me and offered a refund on what I believe is a defective device. They got back to me fairly quick to apologize and offer a refund. Great customer service and happy to leave a good review now!We bought this tablet to use once in a while if our 17 month old gets fussy to watch Ms. Rachel on YouTube and it rarely works. It is the slowest tablet I’ve ever used that we usually end up having to use our cell phones instead. If we do get it to work after waiting forever for YouTube to actually work, it most of the time won’t work for long. My husband and I believe we were sent a defective one because there is no way people would actually give good review on this tablet if it works (or doesn’t work I should say) like ours. At this point I hope the company contacts us from this review or I will just have to find and buy a new product. I wouldn’t even give this 1 star but it wouldn’t let me proceed without at least picking 1 star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Package nicely however, I think I purchased a defective device. I purchased two of these tablets and having the same issue. will not stay connected to the Internet and will not hold a charge. I bought these For my twin granddaughters birthday they are so disappointed and so am I. I hope the company read this review and offers a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these, one purple and one light blue. They are ages 3 and 4. These were very easy to set up and very easy for my children to use and handle. I only wished they stayed charged longer when taking them on road trips. But it's not terrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best, but it does the job
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for..this tablet is not perfect but if you’re on a budget and looking for something to keep your little one occupied.. this is the one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 4-year-old, I know maybe my 4-year-old shouldn't have a tablet, but this mama sometimes needs a break. Lol She had previously had a hand me down tablet and surprisingly took very good care of it. So, I decided to "upgrade" her. It was a good price and for her age I wasn't looking to spend a fortune on one. The setting up was a bit difficult. It did a lot of initially updates and was slow running right from the beginning. It did come fully charged which was nice and the "child proof" case was also a nice addition. After a few times of use I noticed that the tablet was having a hard keeping a charge. I uninstalled some of the programs she would never use and checked for updates. Nothing I seemed to do was helping the charging issue. On top of that It would continually freeze and would have to be completely powered off in order to get it to unfreeze. So, I went through and forced stopped a lot of the background programs. At this point the only program she has on the tablet that is not required in YouTube kids. It also has to remain on the charger in order to stay on. So, all in all I am disappointed in the purchase. I understood that it wasn't going to be the best of the best, but I would have liked for it to have the ability to work properly. At bare min work properly for the first month we had it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids 3 to 5:yrs
reviews.reviewText: Good tablet my grandson is 5 he loves this tablet, tablet does need recharging after 6:hrs but good and safe for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does not connect to the Wi-Fi. It keeps dropping the Wi-Fi. We tried in different household and they keep dropping it so the tablet was malfunctioning when I got it and since I didn’t get any insurance I cannot send it back don’t buy this stuff from Amazon. This tablet is not good at all. Do not buy it. Amazon knew about it. I just looked at all the bad reviews.

reviews.reviewText: 1 month after purchasing it. It just stopped taking a charge and won't work anymore
